data.actual_result: Send button greys out and then rehighlights
data.expected_result: Send button greys out after sending the message
data.short_description: Sending a message in Japanese causes the send button to highlight again
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have a Japanese keyboard (I use Romaji) - Switch to your Japanese keyboard - Type any word in Japanese, and send the message - Observe the send button after you send the message
